name: Kolonial-Krieger-Spende. Von Lettow-Vorbeck LCCN2004665887 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Kolonial-Krieger-Spende. Von Lettow-Vorbeck Abstract: Poster shows General Paul Emil von Lettow-Vorbeck on horseback leading African soldiers. Text at top reads Colonial War Funds; on bottom is facsimile of von Lettow-Vorbeck's signature. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 69 x 47 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Grotemeyer 1918.; Title from item.
